params._auctionId: The ID of the auction to bid in.
params._bidAmount: The bid amount in the currency specified by the auction.

collectAuctionPayout(uint256).notice: Distribute the winning bid amount to the auction creator.

collectAuctionTokens(uint256).notice: Distribute the auctioned NFTs to the winning bidder.

getAuction(uint256).notice: Returns the auction of the provided auction ID.

getWinningBid(uint256).notice: Returns the winning bid of an active auction.

isAuctionExpired(uint256).notice: Returns whether an auction is active.

isNewWinningBid(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns whether a given bid amount would make for a winning bid in an auction.

documentation.text: @dev Only lister role holders can create auctions, when auctions are restricted by lister address.
@dev Only assets from NFT contracts with asset role can be auctioned, when auctions are restricted by asset address.
@dev The max bps of the contract. So, 10_000 == 100 %
@dev The address of the native token wrapper contract.

statements.documentation:
If there's an exisitng winning bid, incoming bid amount must be bid buffer % greater.
      Else, bid amount must be at least as great as minimum bid amount
